name: FMC Chemical sprl
goal: FMC Corporation is an agricultural science company that advances farming through innovative and sustainable crop protection technologies. Headquartered in Philadelphia in the USA, FMC reported revenue of approximately $4,7 billion for the year of 2018. We employ approximately 6500 employees around the globe, including 1500 people in the EMEA region, and we have production sites in several European countries. The FMC European Innovation Center is based in Hørsholm, Denmark, which is also the Global Center for Plant Health, focused on the discovery and development of biological solutions as a supplement to traditional chemical solutions.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Enlargement, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, Public Health, Single market, Taxation, Trade
